author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Shri Bhandarakeri Mutt: Programme on Sri Vyasarajara songs, Sri Raghavendra Swami Temple, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Sri Ramakrishna Institute of

Oncology & Research: World Cancer Day, 10.30 a.m.

Dr. G.R. Damodaran College of Science: National conference on “Achieving Business Excellence: Through the convergence of globalization, technology and innovation”, Charles Babbage Hall, 9.30 a.m.

TRAFFIC (WWF): National workshop on “Capacity building for combating wildlife crime in India”, TN Forest Academy, 8.30 a.m.

Lisieux Group of Institutions: Annual Day Celebration, 5 p.m.

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Programme on “Vaanam Vasappadum”, seminar hall,

10.30 a.m.

Avinashilingam Institute for Home Science and Higher Education for Women University: National conference on “Recent trends in adolescent nutrition and reproductive health care”, 9 a.m.

INTACH & The Vanavarayar Foundation: Museum trip, Govt Arts College, 9.30 a.m.

Poompuhar: Crafts Mela, Meenakshi Hall,

10 a.m.

Maharaja Arts and Science College: Guest lecture on “Positive thinking and personality development”, seminar hall, 10.30 a.m.

V.L.B Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Guest lecture on “Basics of .NET & JAVA”, Conference hall, 2 p.m.

SNMV College of Arts and Science: Workshop on “TALLY”, Computer lab, 8.30 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Exhibition on “FENIX EXPO ‘16”, 10.30 a.m.

VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Electronics exhibition programme,

10.30 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Programme on “Basic management tools”, Conference hall, 9.30 a.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Guest lecture on “Evolution of Coimbatore city and development”, Conference hall, 5.45 p.m.

Kovai Medical Centre and Hospital: Cancer awareness programme, Coimbatore Railway Station, 8 a.m.

Udumalpet

Sri G. V. G. Visalakshi College for Women: "Gateway 16' Inter-departmental programme, 9.30 a.m
title: In Coimbatore Today
